sections.heading: What Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect minimal information to provide and improve our service:
list: Analytics Data: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site (page views, time spent, general location)
Cookies: We store your cookie consent preference and basic site functionality
No Personal Data: We don't collect names, emails, or personal information unless you explicitly contact us

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use collected information only to:
list: Understand site usage and improve content
sections.additionalContent: We never sell, rent, or share your data with third parties for marketing purposes.

sections.heading: Cookies and Tracking
list: Essential Cookies: Remember your consent preferences and site settings
Analytics Cookies: Google Analytics (only with your consent)
sections.additionalContent: You can decline non-essential cookies anytime. We'll ask again after 7 days if you decline.

sections.heading: Your Rights
list: Opt out of analytics tracking (decline cookies)
Request information about any data we may have.

sections.heading: External Services
list: Google Analytics: Web analytics service (Privacy Policy)
sections.additionalContent: These services have their own privacy policies and data practices.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect information. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure. We don't store sensitive personal information.

sections.heading: Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this policy occasionally. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. Continued use of our site means acceptance of any changes.
